verses.text: And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* this it came to pass, that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and \w subdued|strong="H3665"\w* them: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Metheg-ammah|strong="H4965"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.\f + \fr 8.1 \ft Metheg-ammah: or, the bridle of Ammah\f*

And he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* them with a \w line|strong="H2256"\w*, casting them \w down|strong="H7901"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*; even with \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w lines|strong="H2256"\w* \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* he to put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*, and with one \w full|strong="H4393"\w* \w line|strong="H2256"\w* to keep \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*. And \add so\add* the \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* became \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \add and\add* \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4503"\w*.

¶ \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* also \w Hadadezer|strong="H1909"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rehob|strong="H7340"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Zobah|strong="H6678"\w*, as he \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w recover|strong="H7725"\w* his \w border|strong="H3027"\w* at the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*.\f + \fr 8.3 \ft Hadadezer: or, Hadarezer\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* from him a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add chariots\add*, and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*, and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w footmen|strong="H0376"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w houghed|strong="H6131"\w* all the \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* \add horses\add*, but \w reserved|strong="H3498"\w* of them \add for\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*.\f + \fr 8.4 \ft from…: or, of his chariots\f*

And when the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w succour|strong="H5826"\w* \w Hadadezer|strong="H1909"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Zobah|strong="H6678"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* of the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*.

Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w garrisons|strong="H5333"\w* in \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*: and the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* became \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \add and\add* \w brought|strong="H5375"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4503"\w*. And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w preserved|strong="H3467"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* whithersoever he \w went|strong="H1980"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w shields|strong="H7982"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* that were on the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w Hadadezer|strong="H1909"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And from \w Betah|strong="H0984"\w*, and from \w Berothai|strong="H1268"\w*, \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Hadadezer|strong="H1909"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w exceeding|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*.

¶ When \w Toi|strong="H8583"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* had \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* all the \w host|strong="H2428"\w* of \w Hadadezer|strong="H1909"\w*,

Then \w Toi|strong="H8583"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* unto \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, to \w salute|strong="H7592"\w* him, and to \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* him, because he had \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against \w Hadadezer|strong="H1909"\w*, and \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* him: for \w Hadadezer|strong="H1909"\w* had \w wars|strong="H0376"\w* with \w Toi|strong="H8583"\w*. And \add Joram\add* brought with \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*:\f + \fr 8.10 \ft Joram: also called, Hadoram\f*\f + \fr 8.10 \ft salute…: Heb. ask him of peace\f*\f + \fr 8.10 \ft had wars…: Heb. was a man of wars with\f*\f + \fr 8.10 \ft brought…: Heb. in his hand were\f*

Which also \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* did \w dedicate|strong="H6942"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, with the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* that he had \w dedicated|strong="H6942"\w* of all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* which he \w subdued|strong="H3533"\w*;

Of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, and of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, and of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and of \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*, and of the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of \w Hadadezer|strong="H1909"\w*, \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rehob|strong="H7340"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Zobah|strong="H6678"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w gat|strong="H6213"\w* \add him\add* a \w name|strong="H8034"\w* when he \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* from \w smiting|strong="H5221"\w* of the \w Syrians|strong="H0758"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of \w salt|strong="H4417"\w*, \add being\add* \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add men\add*.\f + \fr 8.13 \ft smiting: Heb. his smiting\f*

¶ And he \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w garrisons|strong="H5333"\w* in \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*; throughout all \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* he \w garrisons|strong="H5333"\w*, and all they of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* became \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*. And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w preserved|strong="H3467"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* whithersoever he \w went|strong="H1980"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w executed|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* and \w justice|strong="H6666"\w* unto all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w* \add was\add* over the \w host|strong="H6635"\w*; and \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahilud|strong="H0286"\w* \add was\add* \w recorder|strong="H2142"\w*;\f + \fr 8.16 \ft recorder: or, remembrancer, or, writer of chronicles\f*

And \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahitub|strong="H0285"\w*, and \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w*, \add were\add* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*; and \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w* \add was\add* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*;\f + \fr 8.17 \ft scribe: or, secretary\f*

And \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* \add was over\add* both the \w Cherethites|strong="H3774"\w* and the \w Pelethites|strong="H6432"\w*; and \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* were chief \w rulers|strong="H3548"\w*.\f + \fr 8.18 \ft chief rulers: or, princes\f*
